document.body:
Collection Us New Games Top Games Best Games Free to play thousands of Lea fast food restaurant Games at Cooking Games Online!
Lea fast food restaurant Games
Lea fast food restaurant Games: Hello everyone, Im Lea, and Ive just got a job working in this brand new fast food restaurant, but wow, its hard work! There are so many customers coming in, and they all want to get their orders really quickly. To help me out in this restaurant game, just like in other waitress games like this one, you need to reach the target each day, before my time runs out. You have to seat customers, take their orders, bring them their food and clear their plates away, and you have to do everything quickly so that they dont get impatient. Play Lea fast food restaurant Games at Cooking Games Online!Lea fast food restaurant Games is a very fun game! How To Play: Click on "Start Game" button to play, make sure your browser allow popup. After you click "Start Game" there is a window popup, have fun... Start Game Next Game: Barbecue Roasted Salmon Games Lea fast food restaurant Games Start Game Score:
